channel.title: Making a shop worth tokens[Pi]

item.title: Making a shop worth tokens[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Well iâ€™ve done everything but this part and im stuck.

You know how you make an pk point shop say it currently costs a special item like this?

if (c.myShopId == 2) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " PK points."); return; }

Well I was wondering if anyone knew how to make a shop say it cost tokens, I figured it would be something like this can someone help me please?

if (c.myShopId == 1) { c.sendMessage(thenidontknowhere); return; }

Read full topic
